alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 6:02PM CDT until May 24 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RUSSELL COUNTY... At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld, or 8 miles south of Phenix City, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phenix City, Ladonia, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell, Ladonia Sports Complex, Fort Mitchell Activity Center and Phenix Drag Strip. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
